segments.text: Could you call Mr . Jacob for me , Sara ? I need to go over some stuff with him .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course , Mr . Roberts . But , could you tell me his extension number again ? I haven ’ t got all the numbers down yet .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure , it ’ s 4-8- 7-2 . Don ’ t worry . You ’ re doing a fine job .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you very much . Mr . Roberts .
segments.speaker: S2
